description: Unafraid of showing off her white bits, Kourtney was seen taking a dip on the Mexican coastline in a bright blue bikini this time, which served only to cover the essentials on Monday during the girls' break.
title: Kourtney Kardashian displays underboob in a blue bikini
title_page: Kourtney Kardashian displays underboob in a blue bikini | Daily Mail Online
text:
While sister Kim's voluptuous bottom threatens to break the internet again, Kourtney Kardashian is making a case for the major underboob look.
Unafraid of showing off her white bits, Kourtney was seen taking a dip on the Mexican coastline in a bright blue bikini this time, which served only to cover the essentials.
A mum-of-three with an age-defying summer body, the 38-year-old proved that an unsupportive bikini top makes absolutely no difference to the appearance of her perky assets.
Holiday blues: The single mum-of-three wore a bright blue bikini with almost no support on the chest as she continued her wild vacation in Mexico with girlfriends
Kourtney, who has previously talked about having a boob job at 22, was no doubt leading a revolution in how to wear swimwear, after wearing the same look on Sunday.
Previously she tried the underboob display in scarlet red, yet the bikini top seemed even skimpier, threatening to free the nipple as she put on an energetic display.
In 2010, Kourtney said it was 'not a secret' that she'd had her boobs enhanced during her college years.
Blue beauty: Kourtney looked ripped on the shoreline, showing off her athletic nature as she ran up and down
It is likely she has undergone revisions since her first surgery - implants usually need to be replaced every 10 years - and the brunette has since carried three children.
Kourtney has often talked about her boob job on Keeping Up With The Kardashians; being in her early twenties when she went under the knife the first time.
But Kourtney's busty bikini wasn't the only eye-popping element of her beach look because her abs, legs and arms were all enviably toned, thanks to her unrelenting fitness schedule.
How does she do it? A self-confessed fitness addict, the brunette has an astonishing mum bod
With the girls: Still seemingly separated from ex Scott Disick, Kourtney was enjoying some girl time
A self-confessed gym addict, she maintains her fit form by doing grueling workouts with a personal trainer; the star often shares clips of her sessions to her Snapchat account.
In addition, the E! starlet follows a gluten free and dairy free diet, as seen on previous episodes of KUWTK.
She has spoken out about keeping her household stocked with items like coconut and almond milk as substitutes for dairy.
Kourtney also avoids sugar, specifically refined, and has divulged that she prefers organic and non-GMO groceries.
No holiday blues: Earlier this week, Kourtney was making a strong case for underboob once again
